name: expediency
content:

the situation in which something is helpful or useful in a particular situation, but sometimes not morally acceptable: political expediency Some of their critics claim that recent decisions about tax are are nothing more than political expediency. They are putting short-term expediency ahead of trying to find long-term solutions to the problem. Synonym
